mapper.insert: insert into jaiko_order_status (partner_id, prd_nm, prd_cnt, prd_cnt_box) values (#{partner_id}, #{prd_nm}, #{prd_cnt}, #{prd_cnt_box})
mapper.select: SELECT a.date_ymd REG_DT, IFNULL(PARTNER_NM,'なし') PARTNER_NM, SEQ_ID , PARTNER_ID, PRD_NM, PRD_CNT, PRD_CNT_BOX FROM ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY as date_ymd FROM ( SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 ) AS a CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 ) AS b CROSS JOIN ( SELECT 0 as a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9 ) AS c ) AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ord.SEQ_ID, ord.PARTNER_ID, DEALER_NM PARTNER_NM , PRD_NM, PRD_CNT, PRD_CNT_BOX , DATE_FORMAT(ord.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') REG_DT FROM JAIKO_ORDER_STATUS ord INNER JOIN DEALER_INFO partner on partner.DEALER_ID = ord.PARTNER_ID ORDER BY REG_DT ) AS order_status on a.date_ymd = order_status.REG_DT WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.date_ymd LIKE '${reg_dt}-%' ORDER BY a.date_ymd ASC
